The Sanctuary

A Private Sanctuary for Black, Brown, and LGBTQIA+ Patients navigating Oncology and Alopecia.

The Intersection of Medical Necessity & Artistry

When a patient faces hair loss due to chemotherapy, radiation, or forms of alopecia (such as CCCA), the emotional toll is profound.

Yet, the traditional medical model often leaves patients with two inadequate options: a sterile medical supply store lacking aesthetic expertise, or a public salon lacking privacy and trauma-informed care.

Furthermore, patients with Afro-textured (3C-4C) hair are routinely underserved, forced to accept Eurocentric prosthetic textures that do not reflect their biological identity.

The Donna Jean Solution

We bridge this gap. As a Certified Cranial Prosthesis Specialist and Licensed Cosmetologist, Victor Scotti, Jr. engineers custom, texture-matched prosthetics designed specifically for the unique biological needs of patients of color.

The Sanctuary Model

[Serene Visual: Private Sola Suite]

Healing requires a safe environment. We operate on a strict, One-Patient-One-Provider basis within a private clinical suite. We offer a mirror-optional environment, ensuring patients can navigate vulnerability without the "fishbowl" exposure of an open floor plan.

Core Clinical Services

Custom Cranial Prosthetics

Glueless, tension-free medical units engineered to protect compromised follicles.

Biomimetic Texture Matching

Expert replication of 4C and Afro-textured biological hair.

Precision Color Artistry

Advanced techniques to replicate natural dimensional growth.

For Our Referring Providers

We are committed to providing your patients with the highest standard of empathetic, clinical care. We understand the specific contraindications of oncology treatments and scarring alopecias.

How to Refer a Patient

01. Prescribe

Provide a prescription for a "Cranial Prosthesis" (HCPCS Code: A9282) noting the specific ICD-10 diagnosis.

02. Consultation

Direct the patient for a private, 60-minute Clinical Consultation & Scalp Assessment.

03. Insurance

We provide comprehensive Superbills for commercial reimbursement or TRICARE Gap Exceptions.
